AttributeList.Text: ! NB PuM: I'm not sure that is really reequired, but...
CHECKLIST: * the mold is inserted * the cooling water pipes are connected * the electrode is loaded/catched * XY platform is in the center
CHECKLIST: * The hood is closed * The HC-clamps are closed * Sealings are activated * The CWS is running (or ready for operation)
CHECKLIST: * The hood is closed * The HC-clamps are closed * Sealings are activated * The CWS is running (or ready for operation)
If operator is using for some reasons the joystick then we need to lock the monitoring for a couple of seconds
Phases: Slag molten by an electrode position trend (10
Phases: Slag molten by an electrode position trend
Phases: Slag molten - lock by time
PuM: Normally this controller is always active, except some situations which can be treat by interlocks
PuM/2018-08-02: The controller is always ready, but it could be locked by some circumistanses
Controllers: Power controller AUTO ON command
